    private void checkDateConditions​(Reservation reservation)
    tests if the new reservation matches the conditions : 1. a vehicle can not be rented more than 7 days 2. the date of end must me after the date of beginning of the reservation

      Returns:
      list of all the Reservation objects found
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no reservation found

      Parameters:
      clientId - : id of the Client whose reservations are being looked for
      Returns:
      list of Vehicles objects found
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no vehicle found

    • findVehiclesFromReservations

      private java.util.List<Vehicle> findVehiclesFromReservations​(java.util.List<Reservation> resaByClientId)
      gets a list of all the vehicles rented by a given Client, checking that each vehicle is only once in the list
      Parameters:
      resaByClientId - list of all the reservations of a given Client
      Returns:
      list of vehicles rented by a client

    • findClientsByVehicle

      public java.util.List<Client> findClientsByVehicle​(int vehicleId) throws ServiceException
      gets a list of Client objects by a Client ID
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - : id of the vehicle whose reservations are being looked for
      Returns:
      list of Client objects found
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if no client found

    • findClientsFromReservations

      private java.util.List<Client> findClientsFromReservations​(java.util.List<Reservation> resaByVehicleId)
      gets a list of all the Clients who have rented a given vehicle, checking that each client is only once in the list
      Parameters:
      resaByVehicleId - list of all the reservations of a given Vehicle
      Returns:
      list of clients involved with a given vehicle

    • delete

      public long delete​(Reservation reservation) throws ServiceException
      sends a given Reservation object to the dao to be deleted
      Parameters:
      reservation - : Reservation to delete
      Returns:
      reservationdao.delete(reservation) : the estate of the request
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the reservation hasn't been deleted

    • create

      public long create​(Reservation reservation) throws ServiceException
      tests if the paramaters of the reservation are correct and then send them to the dao to create the reservation
      Parameters:
      reservation - : Reservation object to create
      Returns:
      reservationdao.create(reservation) : the estate of the request
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the Reservation hasn't been created

    • checkDateConditions

      private void checkDateConditions​(Reservation reservation) throws ServiceException
      tests if the new reservation matches the conditions : 1. a vehicle can not be rented more than 7 days 2. the date of end must me after the date of beginning of the reservation
      Parameters:
      reservation - we want to add
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if at least one of the conditions is not respected

    • checkDisponibility

      private void checkDisponibility​(Reservation reservation) throws ServiceException
      tests if the vehicle is not already rented during a given period
      Parameters:
      reservation - we want to add
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the vehicle is already rented during the period

    • checkDurationUnder30Days

      private void checkDurationUnder30Days​(Reservation reservation) throws ServiceException
      tests if the total duration of reservation of a given Vehicle without break is lower than 30 days
      Parameters:
      reservation - we want to add
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if by adding this reservation the total number of resservation days without break is greater than 30 days
